name: MYC_PLAN_SELF_SIGNUP_STAT
description: Status for all MyChart users that are viewing an episode-related MyChart self-signup care plan.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MYC_PLAN_SIGNUP_MYPT_ID
columns.description: MyChart User ID (WPR ID) to be associated with current line for self-signup care plan.

columns.name: MYC_PLAN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Current status of the self-signup plan for MyChart User.

columns.name: MYC_PLAN_CAREPLAN_ID
columns.description: Care plan ID for the MyChart self-signup plan

columns.name: LAST_GEST_AGE_DISMISSED_DAYS
columns.description: Day number of gestation age when MyChart pregnancy progress health feed card was last dismissed.
